main event: A sighting of three reddish hazy objects over Atlanta, Georgia in November 1957.
interesting points: The objects were observed for a total of 45 minutes, The size of the objects was comparable to a basketball, The sighting was documented as a ground-radar and air-visual observation, Preliminary conclusions included possibilities of balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomena, The weather conditions were cloudy with a clear visibility up to 15 miles.
witness description: Civilian, Medical student, 23 years old, resident of Atlanta, GA
